verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* well along \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* though \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w him|strong="H1732"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* blankets, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w keep|strong="H3680"\w* \w warm|strong="H3179"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w search|strong="H1245"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H5650"\w* lord \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w attend|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w care|strong="H2436"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* \w by|strong="H5975"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* side \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w keep|strong="H2552"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w warm|strong="H2552"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w searched|strong="H1245"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w beautiful|strong="H3303"\w* \w girl|strong="H5291"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3478"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* Abishag \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w brought|strong="H3478"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

Adonijah Usurps the Kingdom

\w At|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H1121"\w* \w time|strong="H6440"\w* Adonijah, David’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w by|strong="H6440"\w* \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w*, began \w to|strong="H6213"\w* exalt \w himself|strong="H6213"\w*, saying, “\w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*!” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H6213"\w* \w acquired|strong="H6213"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w run|strong="H7323"\w* \w ahead|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

(\w His|strong="H6213"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w once|strong="H3117"\w* reprimanded \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* saying, “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w act|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* way?” Adonijah \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w handsome|strong="H2896"\w*, \w born|strong="H3205"\w* next \w after|strong="H3117"\w* Absalom.)

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* Adonijah \w conferred|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* Abiathar \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w who|strong="H3548"\w* supported \w him|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w invite|strong="H7121"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* brother \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*. Nathan and Bathsheba before David

\w Then|strong="H8085"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w Bathsheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* mother \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, “\w Have|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* Adonijah \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Haggith|strong="H2294"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w become|strong="H4427"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w our|strong="H8085"\w* lord \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w*?

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w please|strong="H4994"\w*, \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w advise|strong="H3289"\w* \w you|strong="H3289"\w*. \w Save|strong="H4422"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6258"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H4994"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

Since \w the|strong="H8334"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w old|strong="H2204"\w*, Abishag \w the|strong="H8334"\w* \w Shunammite|strong="H7767"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w serving|strong="H8334"\w* \w him|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Bathsheba|strong="H1339"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w down|strong="H7812"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w homage|strong="H7812"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7812"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H4100"\w* desire?”

“\w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w lord|strong="H3068"\w*,” \w she|strong="H1931"\w* replied, “\w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourself|strong="H5921"\w* \w swore|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* maidservant \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*: ‘\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*.’

Otherwise, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* lord \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* rests \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* fathers, \w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* counted \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w criminals|strong="H2400"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w just|strong="H1696"\w* \w then|strong="H1696"\w*, \w while|strong="H5750"\w* Bathsheba \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w speaking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H1696"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* arrived.

\w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w*.” \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w bowed|strong="H7812"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H5650"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w invite|strong="H7121"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*.

\w Has|strong="H4310"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* lord \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w happen|strong="H1961"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w informing|strong="H3045"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w should|strong="H4310"\w* \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* lord \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?” David Renews His Oath to Bathsheba
